content: I've been thinking a lot about the concept of fate and whether everything in life is predestined. I've been attending yoga classes regularly, which has helped me develop a greater sense of self-awareness, and my instructor often talks about finding one's purpose in life. I started attending these classes around the same time I had a disagreement with my best friend, which ultimately made our friendship stronger. Do you think our choices are aligned with a larger plan or do we just make the most of what happens?
